updated proposal.

 

Best regards,

Aravinda.

Hi Aravinda,

 

As mentioned in the additional requirement shared in the ASMD PowerBI tab,
please find attached template for the CPUS data. This template is similar to the
budget sheet shared earlier.


Kindly share with us the quotation for by 31 Aug 2023:

 

Data ingestion Scope

Data Pipeline set up for data sitting outside of our GDWH data, includes Budget
Sheet, Oasis data, CPUS data.

 

PowerBI Scope

3 PBI dashboard that fits in the additonal data.

 

Appreciate if you can prepare the costing that requires Azure services as well
in the proposal.

 

Do let me know if need further clarification at any point of time.

 

Thank you.

 

Wan Xuan

Senior Specialist | Information Systems Department (ISD)

Human Resource, Admin & Systems Division

1) GPOLE,

2) Data downloaded from TMC system (Oasis),

3) Excel Manual input by other dept.

Sep. Project to start by 1st week of Oct.

•• PROTECTED

 

[EXTERNAL EMAIL] DO NOT CLICK links or attachments unless you recognize the
sender and know the content is safe.

Dear Wan Xuan,

 

Kindly find the updated Budgetary quotation following our discussion. I have
addressed the below discussion points in the BQ.

 

 1. The data will be refreshed 2 times a year. when the refresh happens, how are
    we going to handle it?

TeBS Ans: TeBS will be responsible for implementing a batch process that reads
the Excel file from either on-premises or SharePoint and imports the data into
the database. The scheduling of the batch job interval will be discussed with
TMAP and finalized accordingly.

 2. Please help to provide a breakdown of the pricing. (need to include the man
    day efforts)

TeBS Ans: Please find the updated proposal in the attachment.

 3. Few sample dashboards (generic) to be included to the proposal for
    visualization purpose.

TeBS Ans: Please find the updated proposal in the attachment.

 4. Add an optional half a day training for the end users. (provide a high-level
    curriculum/ topic for the engagement.)

TeBS Ans: Please find the updated proposal in the attachment.

 5. Please confirm whether we will provide an end user training for TMAP. The
    objective would be to teach the users how to use Power BI.

TeBS Ans: Yes, for the new implementation, there will be user training will be
provided.

 

Kindly review and let me know for any additional information required.

 

Best Regards,

Aravinda Gunathilake
Sales Manager - Digital Innovation
Total eBiz Solutions Pte. Ltd.
Aztech Building, 31 Ubi Rd 1, #06-01, Singapore 408694

Dear Aravinda,

 

Good day. We have well received your proposal.

 

I have a few clarification points below.

 

May you share with us the tools you will be connecting the source data to
PowerBI? As there is the on-premise (current) and Azure cloud (future), will the
proposal cover this changing point?

 

For the creation of new table to factor in the excel sheet (budget information,
vlook up to reference table[to factor in the highlighted column not in
database]), how will it be done?

 

How about the documentation for this project?

 

Is there any warranty period?

 

Do book a session next week on my calendar to go through the proposal,
negotiation and addressing any other clarification. After that, I will schedule
a call to further discuss the requirement with users.

 

Thank you.

 

Wan Xuan, Ho

Senior Specialist | Information Systems Department (ISD)

Human Resource, Admin & Systems Division

T: +65 6631 3626 

E: wanxuan.ho@toyota-asia.com

Dear Aravinda,

 

To further clarify, this is ASMD PowerBI project scope. I do find that there’s
maintenance queries. However, we do not have records as of current.

 

Please refer to GDWH requirement for the migration scope as provided by Erick.

Do keep in mind that replication will be done by Toyota Thailand team.

In TeBS migration scope, it should be creating the tables and ensure replication
receiving is successful on our end.

 

Within the PowerBI scope, it will be ensuring the data tables are showing
correctly on PowerBI dashboard with calculation and handling the 2 different
excel file to be maintained in the warehouse.

 

Thank you.

 

Wan Xuan, Ho

Dear Aravinda & Arun,

 

Thank you for your call last Tuesday.

 

Note: As our new Procurement Policy, kindly provide us the quotation directly to
Procurement email in the cc by 12 Jul 2023. (Please be reminded to remove me in
the email)

 

As mentioned, TMAP would like to request for a quotation to set up Power BI
that’s currently linked to our physical server in TMAP. Physical server may need
ODBC or other tools to connect. In Q3-Q4 of 2023, it will be moved to cloud
server, most likely Azure. Kindly assist to factor in the cost for this changing
point as well.

 

The link shared separately contains the User Requirement (2 excel and 1 PBI
file) gathered from After Sales Department. The attached excel ASMD PowerBI UR
is the flow of the data and with more details.

 

Sales_FY22-2H Sample data.xlsx – Sample source data

ASMD Dashboard.pbix – PBI file

Sales Analysis_Sample.xlsx – Current sample report

Daily Sales.xlsx – *Daily sales trend

 

PBI report that we have was created by university student previously. Main idea
is to use this as our MVP, we are gathering 1-2 more reports that management
would like to explore.

 

We can set up a call early next week. Do find my availability below.

 

If you require more lead time, do reply to this email and let us know.

 

 

Thank you.

 

Wan Xuan, Ho

Senior Specialist | Information Systems Department (ISD)

Human Resource, Admin & Systems Division

T: +65 6631 3626 

E: wanxuan.ho@toyota-asia.com 

 

Toyota Motor Asia Pacific PTE LTD 

1 Wallich Street #36-01 Guoco Tower 

Singapore 078881
